text: Ara phira'a'unera lokadera pradhanara balale -- ''apani ki musake o tara lokadera chere debena dese biparyaya srsti karate ebam apanake ebam apanara debatadera parityaga karate?’’ Se balale -- ''amara tadera putradera abasya'i hatya karabo ara tadera kan'yadera bamcate debo, ara amara alabat tadera upare pratapasali.’’
